description: Enhances the response with verification of factual claims and explicit indication of confidence levels. This decorator promotes accuracy by distinguishing between well-established facts, likely facts, and uncertain or speculative information.

parameters.name: confidence
parameters.description: Whether to include explicit confidence levels for claims

parameters.name: strictness
parameters.description: The threshold for considering information verified

examples.description: Basic fact checking with confidence indicators
examples.usage:
+++FactCheck
Explain the history and effectiveness of vaccines.
examples.result: Provides information about vaccines with clear indications of confidence levels for different claims

examples.description: High-strictness fact checking that excludes uncertain information
examples.usage:
+++FactCheck(strictness=high, uncertain=exclude)
Describe what we know about dark matter.
examples.result: Presents only well-established scientific facts about dark matter, excluding speculative or uncertain information
